metadata.title: CVE-2018-1000121 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description:
A NULL pointer dereference exists in curl 7.21.0 to and including curl7.58.0 in the LDAP code that allows an attacker to cause a denial ofservice

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-1000121` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

curl - 7.47.0-1ubuntu2.7
libcurl3 - 7.47.0-1ubuntu2.7
libcurl3-gnutls - 7.47.0-1ubuntu2.7
libcurl3-nss - 7.47.0-1ubuntu2.7
No subscription required

criterions.comment: curl package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '7.47.0-1ubuntu2.7').
